p: The prevalence of the virus varies by country and region, from 2% in countries with low prevalence (e.g., UK, Canada, Western Europe, etc.), 2%â€“7% in those with moderate prevalence (e.g., South Korea, Mediterranean countries, Japan, Central Asia, Middle East, and parts of South America), and more than 8% in West Africa and South Sudan, which have the highest prevalence rates [ 37, 38].
